section.heading: Construction and development of excess sewage capacity

content.p:
ยง 119. Construction and development of excess sewage capacity. Any
city or village, any county on behalf of a county sewer district and any
town on behalf of a town sewer district or sewage disposal district may,
in addition to all other powers possessed with respect to the
construction and development of sewage facilities, provide for the
construction and development of capacity in excess of its own needs for
conveyance, treatment and disposal of sewage for the purpose of
conveying, treating and disposing of sewage of another public
corporation or improvement district, and, any provision of law to the
contrary notwithstanding, may contract indebtedness for such purpose.
The term "public corporation" as used in this article shall mean a
public corporation as defined in the general corporation law.
